attributes.action: Introduce BOOT CAMPS for young offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rapid surge of gun crime and other fatal weapons is on the increase more and more. Teenagers involved in Guns, Knives, Drugs, Muggings and other serious crimes should be sent to Boot Camp. I urge the Government to consider introducing US style Boot Camps with a strict code of discipline. Inmates would have the threat of being sent to Prison if they fail to conform to Boot Camp rules.

No more softly, softly approaches to violent crime, it does NOT work!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
